attributes.action: Hold a parliamentary vote on the EU referendum outcome
attributes.background: The EU referendum has been decided by a very close result. Since the outcome has been announced the Leave campaign have walked back and revised many claims/promises. It is clear that the public have been misled. It is vital that our elected representatives review and vote before invoking article 50.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
